title: Professional Babysitting Service
description: Expert babysitters available 24/7 to take care of your children with love and attention. Our trained professionals ensure your child's safety, engage them in educational activities, and maintain their daily routines. Background verified and experienced caregivers.

title: Elderly Care & Companionship
description: Compassionate caregivers providing personalized elderly lifecare hubs. Assistance with daily activities, medication reminders, mobility support, and companionship. Our caregivers treat your loved ones with dignity and respect.

title: Special Needs Care
description: Specialized care for children and adults with special needs. Our trained professionals provide individualized support, therapy assistance, and create a nurturing environment. Experience in autism, developmental delays, and physical disabilities.

title: Post-Surgery Care
description: Professional post-operative care at home. Trained nurses and caregivers assist with wound care, medication, mobility, and recovery exercises. Ensure a smooth and safe recovery in the comfort of your home.

title: Overnight Baby Care
description: Overnight babysitting service for parents who need a good night's sleep. Our experienced night nannies handle feeding, diaper changes, and soothing your baby while you rest. Perfect for new parents or those recovering from childbirth.

title: Dementia & Alzheimer's Care
description: Specialized memory Lifecare Hubs for individuals with dementia and Alzheimer's. Our trained caregivers provide cognitive stimulation, routine maintenance, safety supervision, and emotional support in a familiar environment.

title: Nanny & Tutor Combo
description: Combined childcare and educational support service. Our nanny-tutors provide supervision, homework help, educational games, and skill development. Perfect for working parents who want their children to learn while being cared for.

title: Hospice & Palliative Care
description: Compassionate end-of-life care providing comfort, dignity, and emotional support. Our trained caregivers focus on quality of life, pain management support, and family assistance during difficult times.

title: Respite LifeCare Hub
description: Temporary relief care for family caregivers. Our respite caregivers step in to provide the same quality care while you take a break, attend appointments, or handle personal matters. Available for few hours to several days.

title: Physical Therapy Support
description: In-home physical therapy assistance for rehabilitation and recovery. Our trained aides work alongside therapists to help with exercises, mobility training, and daily therapy routines. Ideal for post-injury or surgery recovery.

title: Newborn Care Specialist
description: Expert care for newborns in the first few months. Our newborn care specialists assist with feeding, sleeping routines, bathing, and provide guidance to new parents. Available for day or overnight shifts.

title: Disability Support Worker
description: Dedicated support for individuals with physical or intellectual disabilities. Our support workers assist with daily living activities, community participation, skill development, and independence building.
